department: Department of National Defence, Combat Training Centre
description: The Department of National Defence has a need for oscilloscopes.
full_summary:
==========================================================================================================


## Procurement Notice
==========================================================================================================

## Title
==========================================================================================================

Oscilloscopes

## Tender ID
==========================================================================================================

                           W2037-24-054A

## Published Date
==========================================================================================================

July 7th, 2023

## Closing Date
==========================================================================================================

July 28th, 2023, at 13:00 hours

## Description
==========================================================================================================

The Department of National Defence's Combat Training Centre is seeking suppliers to provide electrical and electronic products. This is an open tender process, where a selection of Supply Arrangement Holders have been invited to submit proposals. The following companies have been issued invitations:

 

* Anixter Canada Inc.
* Graybar Canada
* Nedco-Rexel
\...

## Delivery and Contract Terms
==========================================================================================================

* Proposed Start Date: TBA
* Proposed End Date: December 31st, 2023
* Place of Delivery: Canada
* Ontario (except NCR)

## Notice of Proposed Procurement
==========================================================================================================

This notice is published on the Canada Buys website: [link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7033/20230707\_rceme\_24054a\_rfp\_en\_0.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7033/20230710\_rceme\_24054a\_rfp\_fr\_001\_0.pdf]

The Crown retains the right to renegotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Participant Requirements - Supply Arrangement Holders**

To participate, companies must have a current and active Supply Arrangement (SA) with the Government of Canada, specifically SA E60HN-16ELEC.

**Contact Information**

                           Aaron Pound

                           aaron.pound@forces.gc.ca

                           (506) 422-7891

                           End of Procurement Notice
